items.content_text: I need to find a better git workflow for posts. Currently posts published through my micropub endpoint are pushed to a branch. That branch gets automatically deployed to preview on Netlify. On a push to main, a GitHub Action deploys to "production". I manually deploy...
items.content_html: I need to find a better git workflow for posts. Currently posts published through my micropub endpoint are pushed to a branch. That branch gets automatically deployed to preview on Netlify. On a push to main, a GitHub Action deploys to "production". I manually deploy changes when a post is made after I've previewed and "approved" them but doing a PR for all of these seems like overkill but that might be the way to go for now.

items.content_text: Added a few more pages. You can now read some info about me, see what devices I use, and a changelog for this site.
items.content_html: Added a few more pages. You can now read some info about me, see what devices I use, and a changelog for this site.

items.content_text: This feels like a minor thing that I might not use often but I added a way to temporary delete posts by "marking" them deleted in my micropub endpoint. Eleventy then renders a "post deleted" page for that post
items.content_html: This feels like a minor thing that I might not use often but I added a way to temporary delete posts by "marking" them deleted in my micropub endpoint. Eleventy then renders a "post deleted" page for that post

items.content_text: I've been working on cleanup mostly but managed to add bookmarks, likes, and rspvs to both my site and my micropub endpoint

items.content_text: I moved the short link functions to its own eleventy plugin and released it to npm. It cleaned up a few things on my end but mostly I was hoping it would be beneficial to somebody else. eleventy-plugin-shortlinks
items.content_html: I moved the short link functions to its own eleventy plugin and released it to npm. It cleaned up a few things on my end but mostly I was hoping it would be beneficial to somebody else. eleventy-plugin-shortlinks

items.content_text: Last Homebrew Website Club meeting was really helpful to figure out a way to handle deleting content. I doubt I'll be using that feature much but thought it was worth the add.

items.content_text: I've been testing my serverless micropub endpoint with micropub.rocks and I'm hoping to have the last few tests fixed soon
